entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
